profile:
Bathroom-Design-Build is a family owned and run business dedicated to giving you that custom bathroom look for the best possible price. Through a strict work ethic and exceptionally high standards of practice, founder Paul McGeehan invariably provides uniquely creative, high-quality craftsmanship to each customer. Bathroom-Design-Build values genuine, honest, open working relationships and strives to provide such consistency to all customers and business partners. 


At Bathroom Design Build we take great pride in our renovation process. Your bathroom may look stunning on the outside but what is underneath? The foundation materials of any bathroom are the most important aspects and will be the deciding factor as to whether your bathroom lasts two or fifteen years. Using high quality proven products that will stand the test of time, prevent water penetration and most importantly prevent mold growth should not be compromised or overlooked.
service_area: Port Moody, Port Coquitlam, Pitt Meadows, Maple Ridge, Burnaby, New Westminster, Surrey, Delta, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Squamish, Whistler, Vancouver
name: Bathroom Design Build

profile:
At Kitchen Installers Vancouver we are an IKEA Certified Installation Company operating throughout British Columbia. Having received accreditation from IKEA in 1992, we have installed thousands of kitchens in the homes of customers and in the IKEA showroom. We have the skills and experience to handle your IKEA Kitchen Renovation from start to finish. 

****

KEALEY Kitchen Installers is a full-service kitchen installation company providing a range of services required by people who have purchased or are considering purchasing an IKEA kitchen. Tom Kealey and his team are seasoned IKEA product professionals and certified IKEA kitchen installers. If you are looking for planning, measuring, assembly and installation, you are in good hands with Tom.

****

Please call TOM at 604-807-1899 for urgent assistance or a free estimate.
service_area:
BC LOCATIONS WE SERVE:
Vancouver and Lower Mainland, Burnaby, Campbell River, Central Saanich, Colwood, Comox, Coquitlam, Courtenay,
Cowichan, Esquimalt, Fraser Valley, Gulf Islands, Kamloops,
Kelowna, Langford, Nanaimo, North Saanich, Oak Bay, Parksville
Penticton, Port Alberni, Richmond, Sidney, Sooke, Surrey,
Victoria.
services:
KITCHEN ASSEMBLY & INSTALLATION SERVICES:

Although we mainly install IKEA kitchens, we also install kitchens from other manufacturers. We install the following major/local brands:
IKEA,
Home Depot,
RONA,
Merit,
OTHER SERVICES:

When installing your kitchen, we can provide other services that support your kitchen installation, including:
IKEA assembly service,
Kitchen electrical,
Kitchen plumbing,
Countertop installation.
brands: We install the following major/local brands: IKEA, Home Depot, RONA, Merit.
specialities:
Since 1992, KEALEY has provided IKEA assembly services, saving Vancouver and Lower Mainland residents time, frustration and headaches.
If you've just purchased IKEA furniture and are scratching your head looking at the assembly diagram, parts, and bags of screws and widgets, you are not alone. Many people purchase IKEA furniture and forget that what they saw in the store displays was assembled by several workers. Assembly is easy...when you know the product and have assembled it dozens of times, but for many, furniture assembly is a jigsaw puzzle and a time consuming exercise in frustration. That's where we can help. You relax, we do the work. You enjoy the end product.
We assemble most IKEA furniture for any room, including:
Living room furniture,
Bedroom furniture,
Bathroom cabinets, furniture and fixtures,
Complete IKEA kitchens,
Get a free IKEA assembly cost estimate.
name: IKEALEY KITCHEN INSTALLERS VANCOUVER

profile: Our team of skilled craftsmen can help you with a wide range of exterior renovations including installing new windows and doors, siding and soffit, painting and staining, and heritage restoration. From patio and garden structures to building deck, stairs, and railings, let us create your dream outdoor living space. MASTER SOLUTION will carry your renovation visions to life with more than 10 years of exterior renovation experience in Vancouver and the Lower Mainland. Our expertise is an outstanding renovation process.
products:
Proudly serving the Lower Mainland since 2007, we are a dedicated team of skilled craftsmen with over 15 years of experience in specialized maintenance & installations, remodeling (shelves, storage, decks), carpentry, drywall, and painting. We offer affordable services in Vancouver, Burnaby, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, New Westminster, and other areas for residents and businesses. We customize our service to each of your individual needs and provide excellent customer service with reliable, guaranteed workmanship. We are licensed, and we carry $2,000,000.00 liability insurance.

We bring consistency from construction, design, and decoration from the start of your project to completion, providing you with a unique and innovative style in the market.
services: We specialize in any Interior and Exterior renovations we design & build, whether it's a *New kitchen, *Bathroom, *Basement, *Addition, *Cabinetry, *Flooring, *Painting, *Drywall & Tape,* Plumbing, *Concrete,* Carpentry, *Retaining walls,*Interior & Exterior Painting,* Deck & Fence, *Basement Finishing, *Demolitions, *Complete Windows and Doors, all Including *Supply and *Installation.

profile:
Hi there! Thank you for checking us out :) Here's a-little bit about us, we are a locally owned and operated company specializing in tile, stone installations and home renovations. We are here to help you make your home dreams a reality while ensuring that your project does not become a nightmare. We aim to guide your project through painless and stress free process by staying on budget, keeping our sites clean, being respectful of you and your neighbours, and walking you through every step of the process so you are confident and happy with your project.

We do tile and stone installation for new builds, bathroom and kitchen remodeling and renovations, as well as other home improvement projects. We are also certified to install Dekton and Silestone. Contact us today for your free estimate or consultation or if you have any questions about how we can help you!

To connect with us, call 778-968-0991 or email us at info@postmoderndesign.ca with details of the services you are looking for.
